Description: Affordable Housing Supply Programme split by social rent, other affordable rent and affordable home ownership
Name: Affordable Housing Supply (Scot Gov)
Route from landing page to data: Data can be located by scrolling to the 'Quarterly Housing Update'  table and clicking on the 'Excel tables - Affordable Housing Supply Programme approvals, starts and completions by social rent, affordable rent, and affordable home ownership and by new build'.  Locate the data in file.
Sizing Notes: Straightforward table structure though some work required on mixed dimensions to enable extraction.  A bit of messiness from a couple footnote markers.
